mapper.sql: e.id, e.evaluateContent, e.evaluateTime, e.evaluateLevel, e.userID, e.positionID, e.state, e.picture, e.createTime, e.updateTime, e.version, e.isDeleted, e.createBy, e.updateBy,e.reply

where 1=1 and e.id = #{condition.id} and e.evaluateContent = #{condition.evaluateContent} and e.evaluateTime = #{condition.evaluateTime} and e.evaluateLevel = #{condition.evaluateLevel} and e.userID = #{condition.userID} and e.positionID = #{condition.positionID} and e.state = #{condition.state} and e.picture = #{condition.picture} and e.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and e.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and e.version = #{condition.version} and e.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and e.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and e.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and e.reply = #{condition.reply}

where 1=1 and e.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(e.evaluateContent) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.evaluateContent}),'%')) and UPPER(e.evaluateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.evaluateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(e.evaluateLevel) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.evaluateLevel}),'%')) and UPPER(e.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(e.positionID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.positionID}),'%')) and UPPER(e.state) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.state}),'%')) and UPPER(e.picture) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.picture}),'%')) and UPPER(e.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(e.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(e.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(e.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(e.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(e.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%'))
mapper.update: update evaluate set evaluateContent=#{evaluateContent}, evaluateTime=#{evaluateTime}, evaluateLevel=#{evaluateLevel}, userID=#{userID}, positionID=#{positionID}, state=#{state}, picture=#{picture}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, reply=#{reply}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from evaluate e where e.id = #{id} and e.isDeleted = false

mapper.select: select from evaluate e left join attachment attachmentEvaluate on e.picture = attachmentEvaluate.id left join shiro_user user on e.userID = user.id left join attachment attachment on user.infoHeadImg = attachment.id left join position position on e.positionID = position.id left join shiro_user positionUser on position.userID = positionUser.id left join attachment attachmentPosition on positionUser.infoHeadImg = attachmentPosition.id WHERE e.isDeleted = FALSE AND e.state = 0 AND position.userID = #{condition.positionUserID} AND position.id = #{condition.positionID} ORDER BY e.evaluateTime DESC

select from evaluate e left join attachment attachmentEvaluate on e.picture = attachmentEvaluate.id left join shiro_user user on e.userID = user.id left join attachment attachment on user.infoHeadImg = attachment.id left join weixin weixin on user.id = weixin.userID left join position position on e.positionID = position.id left join shiro_user positionUser on position.userID = positionUser.id left join attachment attachmentPosition on positionUser.infoHeadImg = attachmentPosition.id left join weixin weixinPosition on positionUser.id = weixinPosition.userID WHERE e.state = #{condition.state} AND e.isDeleted = FALSE AND e.positionID = #{condition.positionID} AND e.userID = #{condition.userID} ORDER BY e.evaluateTime DESC

mapper.select: select from evaluate e left join attachment attachmentList on e.id = attachmentList.refID left join shiro_user user on e.userID = user.id left join weixin weixin on user.id = weixin.userID left join shiro_user replyUser on e.updateBy = replyUser.id left join weixin reweixin on replyUser.id = reweixin.userID ${orderByClause}
